results.title: Deep shit
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Morgan Evans
results.brief_description: When Mr Sideburns (Morgan Evans) stumbles across a security camera tape from the casino which incriminates the Premier, he finds a variety of sources are eager to lay hands on the material. With a casual nod to the Hong Kong action genre, Deep Shit’s momentum carries the viewer through such recognisable Melbourne locales as Parliament Station, Melbourne Central and Queen Victoria Market.

results.title: Deep sea trawler
results.brief_description: Part of the “Man and his world” series, this film describes a trawler’s voyage from its home port on the North Sea to the Grand Banks off Newfoundland. Shows the complete operation of catching and processing the fish.

results.title: Deep hearts
results.creator_credit: Robert Gardner and Harvard University. Film Study Center
results.brief_description: About the Bororo Fulani of the Niger Republic in Africa. The Bororo are a nomadic tribe, moving with their cattle across the Sahel desert each year to gather in large numbers at certain watering places to celebrate their vision of themselves as chosen beings and to enjoy one another’s company. Dressed in ceremonial attire, they celebrate the yearly rains by singing and dancing.

results.title: Deep fat frying
results.brief_description: Presents basic information on deep fat frying, stressing the equipment to be used, the prevention of fat absorption, and the care of fats to prevent decomposition. Shows how to get the highest quality and dollar savings from this cooking method.

results.title: Deep blue world
results.creator_credit: David Adams, Pyramid Films and Ken Rudolf
results.brief_description: Traces an underwater adventure in a colour fantasy of oceanic forms. Takes the viewer to a dark mysterious world, accented by an electronic music score. The diver encounters colour caves of sea anemones, the pastel shades of which build to an exciting brightness, and then returns to the blue surface. Stills set to music. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Deep-sea container ports
results.brief_description: “Summary: the first half of the film takes a general look at containerization and its impact on the ports, and on the international freight transport system, how it has streamlined and mechanized the system. the seco

results.title: Decreasing inappropriate behaviours (TEFC): timeout
results.creator_credit: John Sucho and Macomb Community College Instructional Television
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Effective Behavioural Programming”.
Tape 4 : Timeout is a procedure in which positive reinforcement is withdrawn for a prespecified period of time following the performance of a misbehaviour. There are two types of timeout: exclusionary and non-exclusionary timeout. NB. This tape plays on 525 line NTSC
